hero.title: Hi! I'm Woo Jin.
hero.text: Full stack developer with a passion for problem solving

about.title: About Me
about.text: I've been building various applications since graduating. I also enjoy coding challenges, I'm currently rank 10 on
about.text2: as the only person in the world to have all solutions posted on Github, and I'm top 14th percentile on
about.text3: ! Listed below are the languages and technologies I love using.

experience.title: Experience
experience.text: Since graduating from university in 2022, I've been developing various applications and sharpening my skills.

content.description: Completed coursework involving algorithms, data structures and general programming concepts

projects.title: Projects
projects.text: Here are a few of my favorite projects that I have built over the past few years!

content.description: Youtube clone app made with Node.js/React. Uses FFMPEG and AWS S3 for HLS video streaming.
Chess bot that connects to the lichess api and generates moves using a local chess engine.
An improved version of my very first project, a website to help with lifting. Currently under development!

hobbies.title: Hobbies
hobbies.text: Aside from developing, these are the things that I do for fun!

content.name: Chess
content.description: I enjoy chess as a game of problem solving, much like programming.

content.name: Weightlifting
content.description: I enjoy weightlifting to clear my mind.
